casebody.data:
STATE v. GOODE. No. COA06-630. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed February 20, 2007. Certification Date March 12, 2007. Appeal from Rutherford (04CRS53997, 04CRS53998, 04CRS53999, 04CRS54000, 05CRS2259).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part; reversed in part.
